sqls.sql: SELECT row_num, mtrs_part_no, mtr_part_idt, mtrs_qty, mtrs_qty_d, mtrs_qty_unit, mtrs_waste_rate, mtrs_waste_qty_min, mtrs_use_qty_min, mtrs_priority, mtrs_valid_time_from, mtrs_valid_time_to, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user_no, upd_user, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM pd_rmb_mtrs WHERE unode = @unode;
